entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Greater Napanee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:51 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon with risk of snow squalls. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
